physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'APP' AND %2 >= %3 THEN %4 ELSE  NULL  END

logicalColumns.name: Receipts Count After Due

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'APP' AND %2 < %3 THEN %4 ELSE  NULL  END
